title: Loving Naturals Anti Aging Cream with Alpha Lipoic Acid and Carrot Seed Oil - 2 oz.
description: Prevent, minimize and even eliminate fine lines and wrinkles with this safe, natural, gentle and moisturizing anti-aging cream. This product also will make your pores appear smaller! It is enriched with alpha lipoic acid and carrot seed oil, ingredients proven to combat aging of the skin. It has a light earthy scent of the natural ingredients, specifically the carrot seed oil, which diminishes shortly after application.Ingredients: Purified Water, Grapeseed Oil, Organic Aloe Vera Gel, Organic Vegetable Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol (derived from Organic Coconut Oil without the use of chemicals), Organic Carrot Oil, Alpha Lipoic Acid, Organic Honey, Organic Blue Green Algae, Cellulose, Organic Raw Sugar, Sea Salt, Wild Harvested Aspen Bark ExtractDirections: Apply to face, neck and other desired area, daily or nightly.Warnings: For external use only. Stop use and ask a doctor if adverse reaction occurs or persists

title: Loving Naturals Clear Body SPF 30+ Sunscreen Non-Nano Zinc Oxide UVA/UVB 4.3 oz.
description: Until now safe sunscreen meant sometimes looking a bit ghostly. We are excited to offer a new clear unscented sunscreen with the same great safety ratings as our original formula with improved consistency and feel. We think you are going to love it!! The Clear Body is water resistance up to 40 minutes and can be used alone or along with our Clear Sunscreen Stick on all exposed skin including the face. For a lighter feel and when water resistance is not needed, try our Clear Face Sunscreen and don't forget to protect your lips too with our SPF 30 Lip Balm!Ingredients: Active Ingredient: Non-Nano Zinc Oxide - 24.7% Ingredients: Grape Seed Oil, Organic Sunflower Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides (from Coconut Oil), Organic Beeswax, Stearic Acid (from Palm Oil), Organic Honey, Sea Salt, Purified WaterDirections: Apply liberally on exposed skin before sun exposure, and rub in to remove any white. Reapply after swimming, sweating, after 1-2 hours of use or after towel drying.Warnings: For external use only. Discontinue use and seek a physician if skin rash develops and persists. Rinse with water if sunscreen gets in your eyes. Decrease UV exposure by limiting time in the sun, wearing protective clothing, and using sunscreen. May contain traces of macadamia seed or sesame seed oils.

title: Vanicream Lite Lotion, Pump, 16 Ounce
description: Vanicream lite skin care lotion is a face, hands and body lotion specially formulated to moisturize dry skin. Carefully chosen ingredients effectively moisturize the skin without exposing the user to common chemical irritants. Goes on non-greasy. Dye free, perfume/fragrance free, lanolin free, paraben free, formaldehyde free.
